Welcome to Zentist

We are committed to providing the best dental care for our patients. Our practice has been serving the community for over 20 years, and during this time, we have built a reputation for excellence in dental care and customer service. Our team of experienced and dedicated dental professionals is passionate about helping our patients achieve optimal oral health. We believe in providing personalized and compassionate care that meets the unique needs of each individual. Our goal is to create a welcoming and comfortable environment where our patients feel at ease and confident in the care they receive. At Zentist, we understand that going to the dentist can be a daunting experience for some people. That's why we go above and beyond to ensure that our patients have a positive experience from start to finish. Our friendly staff is always available to answer any questions or concerns, and we work hard to make every visit as stress-free and comfortable as possible. We are proud to have served our community for so many years, and we look forward to continuing to provide top-quality dental care for many more years to come. Thank you for choosing Zentist as your dental care provider.

Practice History

Our clinic came to be from the devotion and love for dentistry of Dr. John Smith.Working and having first-hand experience of the way NHS is treating patients, he wanted something better.This is how Zentist came to be.
  • 1999 Dr. John Smith founded his first practice in Edgware.Driven by his love for dentristry and vision of creating a practice comprehensive services for community.His wish was to provide accesible services
  • 2003 Zentist expanded its services to include orthodontics, offering patients a wider range of options for improving their oral health and aesthetics.
  • 2006 Dr John Smith partnered with Kevin Lewis, a award winning finance advisor and entrepreneur.Their friendship goes all the way back to their childhood, when they used to be football collegues at The Hive Foundation. They came up with a plan to further expand the practice's services with more service in more location.
  • 2013 Zentist Edgware underwent a major renovation,updating its facility with state-of-the-art equipment and modern design
  • 2015 Zentist expanded with another location in Cricklewood.
  • 2017Another location open in Bexleyheath
  • 2020Zentist implemented enhanced safety measures in response to the COVID-19 pandemic, including PPE for staff and patients, increased cleaning protocols, and virtual consultations for some appointments in all locations.
  • 2023 - ?Negotiating with a developer to update Zentist's data management system from a mixed paper-spreadsheet system, to a computer-based storing system.
